page.title: 06SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: As well as the normal subjects, {Maths,Topics,Science,RE,Reading and {storywriting,}we use {Calculators, {Computers,a Video,Tape Recorders and {headsets. We have had lots of exciting visits e.g.{Jorvick Viking Centre,Swanage {Camp,Hindu Temple}and the{Teachers {Centres }where we had lessons on { {Photography}and{Video Recording. Our visitors have included a{Jewess, } a{Sikh }and the manager of{Blue Circle {cement. Our teams include the{Football, {Netball,Rounders}and{Chess Teams.} Three of our chess players played for the Nottingham County Chess team.We had one player on board one. Our clubs include{Art,Music,Gym and {Athletics.}An unusual feature is that we have{Italian Lessons.}
